name: Heaven and Earth Scroll Box
description: 11.11 gift set with exclusive SV (Scroll Variant) cards.
notes: ONLY source of SV-S and SV-G rarities. Contents: 1 brick slab + 2 special packs. Each special pack: 1 guaranteed SV card. One pack has chance at gold SV chase (Gold Minato + Gold Kakashi rarest). Also contains exclusive URs, SPs, HRs.
